�Hugar�


   Hugar was walking when Cyndro, on his screen, poped out.  Hugar walks 
into the screen and falls down.  He then stands up and rubs his Head.  
"Owww, that hurt.  Yeah, I wish to meet Commander Iron Raptor."  says Hugar


>From: Yanshosh@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: Questionable?
>Date: Wed, 11 Jul 2001 02:44:08 -0000
>
>::Cledar/Rixer/Blyer/Forrior/Firearm/Prowl/Cyndro::
>
>Cledar hears IR talking about a battle, and approaches Iron Raptor, 
>stopping and saluting. "Commander, me and my men can help in this battle. 
>We are well trained for things like this, and there are five of us."
>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>Firearm hears the talk, approaching and looking curious. He was always 
>ready for battle.
>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>Prowl nods in reaply to Sideswipe's question. "Yeah. How did it go for you 
>guys?"
>~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>A screen with Cyndro's face on it once again drops down in front of Hugar. 
>"Sorry for not replying earlier. The new parts for the city still have some 
>quirks with it. Do you still want to see Commander Iron Raptor?"
>
>
>
>
>--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> > * Iron Raptor nodded at HotRods report, rather impressed.*
> >
> > " Thank you, Hot Rod.   And as a reward for your loyalty, I would ask 
>that
> > you please assemble a unit of 12 outside the city limits. Ready to move 
>out
> > and assist the Chevron cause at my command."
> >
> > * Thus...she placed her faith in the Maximal that stood at her side. As
> > squad leader for this mission.
> > It HAD occurred to her time and time again that, someday and soon, she 
>had
> > to single out and officially title a transformer to take up the role of
> > 2nd-In-Command.
> > But her attention was soon grasped by AzureBlade; a pleased look 
>crossing
> > her features when he bowed but then that expression was wiped clean off 
>her
> > face when he suddenly spoke his TRUE name.
> > < Protoform Z?!>
> > She remembered the reports on the Protoform X that was in the original 
>Beast
> > Wars...and she remembered the fight she had with it before she was named
> > 3rd-in-command.
> > Slag! That had been one tough bot.
> > And here, bot bowing right in front of her was just ANOTHER of those
> > creatures.
> > Iron Raptor's expression became cold as she eyed AzureBlade, a 
>thoughtful
> > brow lifting. The dominant claw on her boot armor coming down and sparks
> > flew as the tip collided with the armored floor.
> > It was questionable...yes. But could she condemn another prototype that 
>was
> > no different then herself?
> > Her expression softened a bit.*
> >
> > " AzureBlade...though I know nothing of your sins I am sure that, as 
>long as
> > your actions remain true to the Maximal cause, orders are followed, and 
>your
> > loyalty remains pure for the remainder of your existence, all will be
> > forgiven."
> >
> > * A growl tricked from her throat as blue eyes narrowed.*
> >
> > " But for a time being you will remain close to me. So that you not only
> > show that you are worthy to the fellow Maximals but to me as well.
> > Until you have proven so, your acceptance into this unit is reserved."
> >
> > * Iron Raptor looked down at him.*
> >
> > " Do you understand?"
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
